entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one whose birthday it is, as indicated by Hermione's 'Happy birthday' greeting.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who gave Harry a present, an enchanted razor from Bill and Fleur.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the one who seems not to hear Hermione's question about what he got for Harry.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is the one who gave Harry an enchanted razor as a present.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is the one who gave Harry an enchanted razor as a present.

entities.name: monsieur delacour
entities.description: Monsieur Delacour is the one who assured Harry that the enchanted razor will give him the smoothest shave he will ever have.

relationships.description: Hermione gave a present to Harry, an enchanted razor from Bill and Fleur.
Ron got a present for Harry, but it is not specified what the present was.
